casebody.data:
Integon National Insurance Company, Plaintiff,
v.
Sammy King and Samantha Comer, Co-administrators of the Estate of Grady Saunders King and Billy and Carolyn Hunt, Co-administrators of the Estate of Roxann Carol Turner, Defendants. No. COA16-600 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 20, 2016

AFFIRM.
